DOC.brief_summary: A comparison two pain control method - combination Adductor Canal Block ( ACB ) /Periarticular Injection ( PAI ) /Infiltration interspace popliteal artery capsule posterior knee ( IPACK ) versus Periarticular Injection ( PAI ) - patient undergoing total knee arthroplasty . Primary outcome NRS pain score ambulation postoperative day one ( 24 hour post-block administration ) .
DOC.brief_title: Adductor Canal Block With Periarticular Injection IPACK ( ACB/PAI/IPACK ) Versus Periarticular Injection ( PAI )
